body.name: Mini Travel Iron with Steam, 2 In 1 Dry and Wet Mini Steam Iron for Clothes, Ceramic Coated Soleplate, 180° Rotatable Fast Heat-Up Small Iron for Home and Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 12 mins
features: Digital Screen with 8 Preset Settings: The digital design of the iron and the ironing material guide for each gear on the iron allow you to easily select the appropriate ironing temperature according to the material of the ironing fabric, such as nylon, silk, wool, cotton, jeans, linen, and other fabrics.

Versatile Design: The Iron with 180-degree rotating handle for easy maneuverability. Travel steam iron is designed for both garment steamer Hanging and flat ironing styles, making it a versatile tool for all your ironing needs. The ceramic coated non-stick soleplate of the mini steamer iron is very durable, conducts heat quickly and evenly, ensures smooth sliding on the fabric, effectively removes wrinkles, and better protects your clothes.

Fast Heating and Powerful Steamer: The mini steam iron has 1200W, which can heat up quickly in 10 seconds for constant temperature ironing. Much faster than traditional steam irons, getting clothes back to new in no time. The steamer has a powerful steam function, which can continuously output steam with one button opening. The delicate steam has strong penetrating power, which can easily and effectively soften the fibers of clothes deeply, and remove various wrinkles and stubborn creases.

Portable Steam Iron Travel Size: The foldable handle design of the portable steamer iron for clothes provides convenience for your storage. Our steam iron comes with a portable cloth bag for easy storage and portability. It also includes water cup accessories for convenient water supply. You can take it with you on vacation, back to school,off to college or travel, and iron anytime, anywhere.

Not A Used Item: All steam iron are water tested after production to ensure that the product can be used normally, so there may be a small amount of water in the water tank, please rest assured that this is a normal phenomenon, not a second-hand product. If there is any problem with the goods you received, please feel free to contact us, we will solve the problem within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional Portable Steamer Mini Iron for Clothes Designed with one-button control, 180° Rotatable handle, convenient to use. Powerful 1200-Watt makes it easily removes wrinkles from almost any fabric. Quick-Heat Technology allows it heats up in just 10 seconds. Nonstick Ceramic Soleplate offers superior glide and a precision tip for faster easier ironing.

Steamer for Clothes Travel Size Handheld iron can save space, is a lightweight, compact design, and very suitable for travel and outing use. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy practico cuando vas de viaje
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto sobretodo que es de muy buen tamaño para llevarlo cuando vas de viaje ,calienta super bien y muy rápida se me isi muy practico y deja muy bien plachada toda tu ropa en especial las camisas de vestir

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: Cute, compact, works great! Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not big at all, but I used it on the cotton setting for my daughter's dress and OMG, the amount of steam that came out of this baby was crazy. Heads up very quickly and has a mini stand to rest it on while you flip your clothing item or whatever. I think it's a great idea, but it doesn't help too much when I still have to put up an ironing board to use it. Today I acted as if I was on a trip and used it on the bathroom counter. Issue with that was with the steam it let out, the surface got wet a little which got the clothing item damp. Not crazy damp, but damp. So as a replacement for an iron, not sure I can say I'd use it for that simply because of the shape too. Missing the point that an iron has allows you to reach those hard to reach parts, whereas a rounded nose makes it more difficult. It's pretty compact and comes with a small cloth carrying/ storage bag. Overall a nice item to have around. An improvement to the item would be if it could be used in a vertical position as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We tried using it the first time and it just didn’t work! Filled it with water below the max line using the provided cup, plugged it in, and tried all the settings but no heat or steam, just drips of water coming out of the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de guardar en maleta y cómoda para usar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for hanging clothes
reviews.reviewText: The main reason I bought this was for steaming my clothes when they're hanging, and you can't use this like that - well, you can, but it's not effective. So far, none of my cotton garments have gotten dewrinkled; I haven't tried my more delicate fabrics (rayon) but it should work well just because rayon smooths out as easily as it creases. I needed to steam a couple of tea towels to frame, but I'll have to use a traditional iron method, which I was trying to avoid since the printing on these towels is very much decorative and I'm not sure how it's going to hold up. This would absolutely work as a steam iron, but then you're filling up the reservoir often if you're ironing more than maybe 2 things.Thankfully the water hasn't leaked, even with all the moving around.The unit warms up very fast - and STAYS hot long after you unplug it - I burned myself twice the first time I used it.*No on/off button, you just have to unplug it. I really hate that.Certainly not for travel, hotel (and even motel rooms sometimes) provide little irons that will do the same thing, unless you're going somewhere bear-bones but also still somehow need a steamer.All in all, I would have returned this if I could since it's not what it claims to be nor what I needed/wanted, but I purchased it through Vine for a discount so I'm unable to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome travel iron
reviews.reviewText: ThIs is a perfect iron for the normal day to day use or while traveling. It heats up quickly with varying heat settings, it’s very easy to use with a compact design, and simply gets the job done! If you’re limited on space, this is going to be a great option for you. Removes wrinkles and heats up to iron on patches with easy, definitely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Confusing, Potentially Dangerous Instructions
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. EDIT:1. Ok. I've used it a few times now. It can be used with handle swiveled both in (like a regular iron) and out.2. The tank lid pops whenever it's unplugged and cooling regardless of the water level.3. The cup had a crack in the bottom.NOW FOR THE REALLY IMPORTANT STUFF:1. THE ONLY WAY TO TURN IT ON AND OFF IS BY PLUGGING AND UNPLUGGING.2. I read all the important safeguards which say "(Note: Do not turn ON the power before adding water)", but later in the instructions, it says to "add water promptly" if the water runs low, which means it WILL BE ON.3. Swiveling the handle does not turn it on or off, and the handle must be in swiveled out to fill the water reservoir.4. Instructions say to have the unit in the OFF position, but later says to unplug it to turn it off. Again, there IS NO ON/OFF SWITCH.5. Under IRONING METHOD, #4 says "Double click on the switch to STOP WORKING." It does NOT STOP WORKING. It sets it back to 1 - DRY mode.
